channel.title: CVE Feed for EFACEC -- BCU 500
channel.description: The latest CVEs for EFACEC -- BCU 500

item.title: CVE-2023-6689|2024-08-02T08:35:14.914Z -- efacec -- bcu%20500
item.description: A successful CSRF attack could force the user to perform state changing requests on the application. If the victim is an administrative account, a CSRF attack could compromise the entire web application.
